description: This file defines a React functional component called Modal, which renders a modal dialog UI element with customizable content, title, and footer. It manages visibility based on the 'open' prop and handles close actions.

methods.name: Modal({ open, onClose, title, children, footer })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog with accessibility features and customizable content.

search-terms: props: open, onClose, title, children, footer

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ open, onClose, title, children, footer }) {$/
